channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 乔-拜登总统和其他七国集团领导人试图向乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基保证他们的支持
item.description:
President Joe Biden and fellow G-7 leaders sought to assure Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy of their support https://t.co/AINfWRdGfP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: Capital One 将以 350 亿美元的价格收购 Discover，这将使两家最大的信用卡公司合二为一，并与华尔街其他巨头展开竞争。
item.description:
Capital One is set to buy Discover in a $35 billion deal that would bring together two of the biggest credit card firms and allow them to compete with other Wall Street behemoths.@RitikaGuptaTV explains what that could mean for consumers https://t.co/YYuCIsduCl pic.twitter.com/511UU21Z6T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 西非国家经济共同体（ECOWAS）领导人周六解除了去年尼日尔发生政变后对尼日尔实施的影响深远的制裁措施
item.description:
Leaders of ECOWAS on Saturday lifted far-reaching sanctions imposed on Niger after a coup last year https://t.co/GBipLBMV86

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: Moncler 高层股东表示，以石岛（Stone Island）运动装品牌闻名的家族正在以 "合作 "的方式退出
item.description:

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司营业收入超出预期，现金储备达到创纪录的 1,676 亿美元

item.title: 哈坎德-希奇莱马总统说，中国和印度是最后两个需要签署赞比亚债务重组协议的国家，它们终于签署了协议。
item.description:
China and India, the last two nations needed to sign a deal to restructure Zambia’s debt, have finally done so, President Hakainde Hichilema said https://t.co/yUBN2cdkYL

item.title: 在一年一度的农业博览会开幕式上，对繁文缛节和成本上升感到愤怒的农民们向埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统起哄
item.description:

item.title: 去年申请破产保护的巴西公用事业公司 Light SA 发布了新版司法恢复计划，计划增资 15 亿雷亚尔，与债权人进行债务重组谈判。
item.description:
Light SA, a Brazilian utility that filed for bankruptcy protection last year, released a new version of its judicial recovery plan outlining capital increase of 1.5 billion reais amid ongoing negotiations with creditors to restructure its debt https://t.co/W2dPclfQYO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 据报道，Enel 预计今年意大利公用事业公司的净债务将下降，从而与同行保持一致
item.description:
Enel reportedly expects the Italian utility’s net debt to drop this year, bringing it in line with peers https://t.co/ao8lnyC4sQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: Gabriel Makhlouf 说，欧洲央行不应匆忙做出降息决定，但要对工资上涨过快的风险保持 "高度警惕"。
item.description:
The ECB shouldn’t rush into a decision to cut interest rate but remain “very vigilant” of risks that wages might be rising at too fast a clip, Gabriel Makhlouf says https://t.co/Vr4U1uv7li

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党陷入紧张局势，现在正是加薪的好时机。以下是英国周六简报

item.title: 俄罗斯对乌克兰的战争已于周六打响两年，这场冲突开启了几十年来最具地缘政治色彩和分裂性的时代。周末阅读
item.description:
Russia’s war against Ukraine arrived at the two-year mark on Saturday, a conflict that began the most geopolitically charged and divisive era in decades. Here’s your Weekend Reading https://t.co/mD6rt13ujq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 在人工智能方面，拥有一个允许混乱的资本市场可能是美国相对于中国的重要优势。
item.description:
Having a capital market that allows for chaos may prove a vital advantage for the US versus China when it comes to AI https://t.co/QIZxwIRyr8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 在纽约州对唐纳德-特朗普提起的民事欺诈诉讼案中，法官做出了 3.55 亿美元的判决，称这位前总统欠下了 9,900 万美元的利息。
item.description:
The judge who hit Donald Trump with a $355 million verdict in New York state’s civil fraud suit against him said the former president owes $99 million in interest https://t.co/KAGAWSLhJw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 一个十几岁的程序员是否影响了埃隆收购 Twitter 的决定？在本期 "埃隆公司 "播客特别节目中，@KurtWagner8 讨论了他的新书《Battle for the Bird》，讲述了 Twitter 的公司历史以及导致马斯克收购 Twitter 的事件。
item.description:
Did a teenage programmer influence Elon's decision to buy Twitter?

On this bonus episode of the Elon, Inc. podcast, @KurtWagner8 discusses his new book, "Battle for the Bird," about Twitter's corporate history and the events that led to Musk's takeover https://t.co/cK0aQzMdYV pic.twitter.com/Ku17Clxjmx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 在这家总部位于新加坡的汇款服务提供商成为央行调查对象之后，森利特否认进行过任何欺诈性交易

item.title: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）认为，德国的经济运行远低于其能力水平，未来几年才有可能出现真正意义上的经济复苏
item.description:
Germany’s economy is functioning so far below its capacity that a meaningful recovery is likely to take hold in coming years, according to Fitch Ratings https://t.co/lbRgjjtE5k

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024
